creditline: Gift of Richard L. Simmons in honor of Lotus Stack
department: Art of Africa and the Americas
description: ivory ground; wide red stripe with fine orange stripes in center along one edge; fine red stripes run end to end; 9 double pale red stripes edge to edge; edge to edge motifs 5 rows - center chevrons, birds, animals and flowers in other 4 rows; colors shades of purple, light green and ivory
title: Mantel de cofradia
